commit.message:
Fix casts in constant expressions

Fixes #17074.

+static X: u64 = -1 as u16 as u64;
+static Y: u64 = -1 as u32 as u64;

+fn main() {
+    assert_eq!(match 1 {

+        Y => unreachable!(),
+        _ => 1i
+    }, 1);
